snippet.title: Plague Inc. Trailer - Android
snippet.description:
Plague Inc., the critically acclaimed, chart topping strategy game of 2012 by Ndemic Creations, is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation for mobile. Can you infect the world?! 

Get it now on Google Play - published by Miniclip: ‪http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.miniclip.plagueinc‬

FOLLOW Plague Inc.:
Twitter - ‪https://twitter.com/NdemicCreations‬
Facebook - ‪https://www.facebook.com/Ndemic.Creations‬
Mailing list - ‪http://www.ndemiccreations.com/home/newsletter‬

FOLLOW MINICLIP: 
Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Miniclip
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/Miniclip
Follow us on Google+: http://plus.google.com/+Miniclip/
Read our blog: http://blog.miniclip.com
